sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个前置词都有"在……期"之意。
means: during ： 侧重指习惯性的某一段时间，而for指特定的某一段时间；during指继续的时间概念，突出事件发生的时刻，而for侧重事件持续时间的总长度。

sentence.Network_en: She rejected his advances during the trip to Cannes.
sentence.Network_cn: 在去往戛纳的途中，她拒绝了他的挑逗。

sentence.Network_en: He lost two stone in weight during his time there.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在那儿的时候体重下降了2英石。

sentence.Network_en: She produced the knife during arguments with her friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 在和朋友争吵的时候，她掏出了刀。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... duration 持久 during 在□期间 dusk 黄昏.
2013高考英语二轮专题复习经典导学案（87） ... dumpling? 饺子 during 在…期间；…过程中 dusk 黄昏.
人教版七年级下册英语单词表 ... sleep 睡觉 during 在……期间 at night 在晚上.
I tend to go to bed earlier during the winter ., 我在冬天常睡得较早.

during the different periods after surgery , the concrescence of iliac bone grafted are all reliable and safe among four titanic plates , the stability of infereior-posterior one is the worst .在本实验条件下，下颌骨体部缺损游离髂骨块移植三种连接方式三个不同时期，髂骨块愈合均具有一定的稳定性和安全性。
人教版高一英语词组_百度百科 ... from around the world 来自全世界 during festivals 在节日期间 since then 自那时以来.
Durco 杜尔柯耐热耐蚀镍铬合金duree quilt 大花床单Durehete 杜尔赫特抗蠕变钢

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: present participle of the obsolete verb dure 'last, endure, extend', via Old French from Latin durare 'to last' (see duration)

entry.def: If something happens during a period of time or an event, it happens continuously, or happens several times between the beginning and end of that period or event.

example.ex: Sandstorms are common during the Saudi Arabian winter...
example.tran: 在沙特阿拉伯,冬季里沙尘暴很常见。

example.ex: Plants need to be looked after and protected during bad weather.
example.tran: 天气恶劣时要留意照看好植物。

entry.def: If something develops during a period of time, it develops gradually from the beginning to the end of that period.

example.ex: Wages have fallen by more than twenty percent during the past two months...
example.tran: 在过去的两个月里，薪资降幅超过 20%。

example.ex: American business in Britain during the 1950s grew much faster than British business.
example.tran: 20 世纪 50 年代，美国企业在英国的发展速度要比英国本土企业快得多。

entry.def: An event that happens during a period of time happens at some point or moment in that period.

example.ex: The attack is believed to have been carried out during the early morning hours...
example.tran: 据信进攻是在清晨时发起的。

example.ex: During his visit, the Pope will also bless the new hospital.
example.tran: 在访问期间,教皇还将为新医院祈福。

auth_sentence.content: Mairead Philpott did not speak during the press conference.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mairead Philpott did not speak during the press conference.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mairead Philpott did not speak during the press conference.

auth_sentence.content: He sustained a serious mortar injury during the conflict.
auth_sentence.res_content: He sustained a serious mortar injury during the conflict.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He sustained a serious mortar injury during the conflict.

auth_sentence.content: They did not fire their weapons during the search.
auth_sentence.res_content: They did not fire their weapons during the search.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They did not fire their weapons during the search.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dour=dur心硬不为所动→adj.冷酷的,严厉的
dur持久,延续,坚硬+able……的→adj.持久的,耐久的
ob加强+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate……的→加强硬→顽固
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ation表名词→n.持久;期间;持续时间
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ess表名词或动词→硬压→强迫
endure[v.忍受,持久,持续]+ance表名词→n.忍耐[力],持久[力],耐久[性]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在……的期间, 在……的时候
stems_affixes.word_buile: dur延续+ing状态→prep.在……的期间, 在……的时候
in进入+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate使……→使成为坚硬
per贯穿+dur持久+e→v.持久, 继续

Sentence.sentence: The 4-H girls planted trees and took care of them during the early stages of growth.
During her two years with the Peace Corps, Donna lived in a village in northeastern Brazil.
The divorce rate rose again during the rest of the decade as the recovery took hold.

As a young man, he began walking over tens of thousands of miles during his lifetime, through the south to Florida, the west to California and north to Alaska, where readers are taken a long and particularly hair-raising adventure on a large mass of floating ice
During the 1980s he noticed an increasing number of long poems among the submissions, with some running to 70 or 80 pages.
Wheatley may have been the first, but she was not the only slave to write books during the growing days of the Republic

means.word_mean: (表示时间)在某情况的一段时间

sentences.en: Where shall you go during the summer?
sentences.cn: 今年夏天你将到什么地方去?

means.word_mean: (表示时间)在…期间, 当…之时, 在…期间的某个时候

sentences.en: The fire started during the workmen's dinner.
sentences.cn: 火灾是在工人们吃饭时发生的。

jushi.english: There happened many events during his term of presidential service.
jushi.chinese: 在他的总统任期内,曾发生过许多事情。

jushi.english: The sun gives us light during the day.
The fire started during the workmen's dinner.
jushi.chinese: 火灾是在工人们吃饭时发生的。
